Description: The gender of the players in the country
The country
The gender specific FIBA senior ranking spot of the country
The gender specific FIBA senior ranking spot of the country
The gender specific FIBA senior ranking points of the country
The gender specific FIBA youth ranking points of the country
The min-max scaled gender specific FIBA senior ranking points of the country.
The min-max scaled gender specific FIBA youth ranking points of the country.
The reported number of gender specific licensed basketball players in the country.
The standardized number of gender specific licensed basketball players in the country.
The number of gender specific generations included for the country.

Variable Name: Average Number of Youth National Team Players
Description: The average number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship.

Variable Name: Coefficient of Variation of Number of Youth National Team Players
Description: The coefficient of variation between generations (expressed in percentage) of number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship.

Variable Name: Average Number of Youth Nation Team Players in 1988-1995 Generations
Description: The average number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Coefficient of Variation of Number of Youth Nation Team Players in 1988-1995 Generations
Description: The coefficient of variation between generations (expressed in percentage) of number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship  (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Average Number of Senior National Team Players
Description: The average number of players in each generation that have played at least one official senior national team game (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Standardized Average Number of Youth National Team Players
Description: The coefficient of variation between generations (expressed in percentage) of number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship  (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Standardized Coefficient of Variation of Number of Youth National Team Players
Description: The coefficient of variation between generations (expressed in percentage) of number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship.

Variable Name: Standardized Average Number of Youth Nation Team Players in 1988-1995 Generations
Description: The standardized average number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Standardized Coefficient of Variation of Number of Youth Nation Team Players in 1988-1995 Generations
Description: The standardized coefficient of variation between generations (expressed in percentage) of number of players in each generation that have played at least one youth championship  (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).

Variable Name: Standardized Average Number of Senior National Team Players
Description: The standardized average number of players in each generation that have played at least one official senior national team game (in the generations that are included in the youth to senior analysis).
